hidden_abilites: For normal attacks, increases number of dark energy blasts and attack range.
Appears quickly to cast a shield to block 99% of damage for all friendly units for a short period.
Attack speed increases by 4% and critical damage increases by 6% for all units.
Upgrades undead units from guild barrack by 1. (Regular, evolved, evolved +, evolved ++, evolved +++) ==> (evolved, evolved +, evolved ++, evolved +++, evolved ++++ )
description.skill1: Increase attack speed of range unit in Guild War (0.6%, 1.2%, 1.8%, 2.4%, 3%)
description.skill2: Increase attack speed of range unit in Guild Raid (0.6%, 1.2%, 1.8%, 2.4%, 3%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Dark Admiral ]
